suites.title: Edit profile and Comunication with Website.
suites.description: As a registered user with Email , user must can make changes on his profile and comunication with website.

cases.title: Edit Contact information - Name Last Name.
cases.description: User must be able to edit contact information.

steps.action: 1. Under Contact information click on edit
steps.expected_result: Fields with Nick name and Last name apear.

Receiving system  message:
You have saved the profile information. Changes is compleated.

cases.title:
Edit Contact information
 - Change Email.
cases.description: User must be able to change his Email.

steps.action: 1. Under Contact information click on edit.
steps.expected_result:
```
An option to change the email appears.
```
New Empty text fields appears.

Changes is compleated, receiving system messages: 
You save account information. Receiving personal messages in Email: kikinmakinti@abv.bg

cases.title: Edit Contact information - Change Email with existing Email.
cases.description: User must be not able to change his Email.

steps.action: 1. Under Contact information click on edit.
steps.expected_result:
```
An option to change the email appears.
```
New Empty text fields appears.
Changes is not compleated, receiving system message: A customer with the same email address already exists in an associated website.

cases.title: Edit Contact information - Change Invoice details.
cases.description: User must be able to change his Invoice details.

steps.action: 1. Under Contact information click on edit.
steps.expected_result:
```
An option to change the Invoice details appear.
```
New Empty text  fields appears

steps.action: Enter data in any fields with this mark ‘‘\*’’
steps.data:
1 Company name: Gazprom

2 UIC: 222333444555 

2 click on ‘‘Registered for VAT’’ 
3 VAT Number: BG222333444555

4 City: Burgas

5 Adress:  jk. Slaveikov 69

6 MALL: 6666

steps.expected_result:
```
The changes are successful: receiving system messages: You have saved the profile information.
```

cases.title: Edit Contact information - Change Invoice details without complete any field with ''*'' symbol.
cases.description: User must be not able to change his Invoice details.

steps.action: 1. Under Contact information click on edit.
steps.expected_result:
```
An option to change the Invoice details appear.
```
New Empty fields appears.
User received system messages with red color that must fill in the fields with a ‘‘\*’’sign.

steps.data:

cases.title: Edit Contact information - Change Invoice details with Type "personal" ,without complete any field with ''*'' symbol.
cases.description: User must be not able to make change Invoice details.

steps.action: 1. Under Contact information click on edit.
steps.expected_result:

```
An option to change the Invoice details appear.
```
New Empty text fields appears.

Save is Compleated , receiving system messages:

cases.title: Edit Bulletins information.
cases.description: User must be able to edit Bulletins information.

steps.expected_result:
Receiving system message:
You have subscribed to our newsletter.

Our  Bulletins is with new status
You are currently subscribed to General Subscription. Receiving personal Email Successful registration for bulletin.

cases.title: Connecting with website service using phone call.

steps.expected_result: Connection with website site is sucesfull.

cases.title: Connecting with website service using email link.
cases.description: User must be able to connect with website service without any problem using email link.

steps.expected_result: New windows occur with options to send Email.
Text field appears with options to send message.
Message is send.

cases.title: Connecting with website service using Messenger button outside working hours.
cases.description:
User must be able to connect with website service without any problem using message button. Sending message 
outside working hours.

steps.expected_result: New windows appears with options for Faccebok or continue as Guest.
Windows with chat appears
System answered : We will reply to you as soon as possible within business hours of. Appears options: Waiting for reply with two options ,Not now and  Continue.
Occur windows with Facebook.com
Appears same system chat but having history of chat.
New windows with chat history appears.

cases.title: Connecting with website service using Messenger button - Attach filles.
cases.description: User must be able to connect with website service without any problem and  using Attach filles.

steps.expected_result: New windows appears with options for Faccebok or continue as Guest
Windows with chat appears
Appears system message;**Send Attachments in Messenger’’ with two**   options : Not now , Continue

```
System message disappears, empty chat is avalivable.
```

cases.title: Connecting with website service using Messenger button -Attach filles.
cases.description: User must be able to connect with website service without any problem and  using Attach filles.

steps.expected_result: New windows appears with options for Faccebok or continue as Guest.
Windows with chat appears.
Appears system message;**Send Attachments in Messenger’’ with two**   options : Not now , Continue.

```
New windows with Facebook options appears.
```
Page reloading, we are able to attach fille with Facebook profile.
User is able to select file from my computer.
Filles is sucesfull attach

cases.title: Connecting with website service using Messenger button - Add Messenger To Your Website.
cases.description: User must be able to connect with website service without any problem and  using Add Messenger To Your Website.

steps.expected_result: New windows appears with options for Faccebok or continue as Guest.

steps.action: Find Navigation menu ,and click on it.
steps.expected_result:
Two option appears: ‘

1\.Visit Facebook page.

2\.Add Messenger to your Website.

steps.action: Click on Add Messenger to your Website.
steps.expected_result: New windows occur: Faccebok page .

cases.title: Connecting with website service using Messenger button - Navigation menu.
cases.description: User must be able to connect with website service without any problem and  using **Navigation menu.**

steps.expected_result: New windows appears with options for Faccebok or continue as Guest.

steps.action: Find Navigation menu ,and click on it.
steps.expected_result:
Two option appears: ‘

1\.Visit Facebook page.

2\.Add Messenger to your Website.
